title: How can I receive crypto using GCrypto
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)

Receiving crypto in GCrypto allows you to securely add digital assets to your wallet directly from another wallet or sender.

### **How to receive crypto using GCrypto:**

1. Open your GCrypto Dashboard and select the crypto you wish to receive
2. Tap **Receive**

**![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/41424188571673)**

3. Share your **QR code** or **public key** with the sender

Please make sure the sender uses the correct blockchain network (e.g., BTC should only be sent via the Bitcoin network) to prevent transaction errors.

You will receive a confirmation of the transaction in your **email.** You can also track the transaction in your **GCrypto Transaction History** to verify and monitor the details.

### **Need more Help?**
